tests.name: Testing Autograder
tests.run: echo "THIS IS ONLY A TEST. SCORES MAY ADJUST IF AUTOGRADER IS UPDATED"

tests.name: Run server listening on randomly-assigned port
tests.run: PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; (timeout --signal=SIGINT 5 node server.js --port=$PORT; exit 0) & sleep 1s && curl -vI http://localhost:${PORT} && sleep 5s

tests.name: Status code
tests.run: PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; (timeout --signal=SIGINT 5 node server.js --port=$PORT; exit 0) & sleep 1s && curl -I http://localhost:${PORT} && sleep 5s

tests.name: Content type
tests.run: PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; (timeout --signal=SIGINT 5 node server.js --port=$PORT; exit 0) & sleep 1s && curl -I http://localhost:${PORT} && sleep 5s

tests.name: Table check
tests.run: PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; (timeout --signal=SIGINT 5 node server.js --port=$PORT; exit 0) & sleep 1s && curl -v http://localhost:${PORT} && sleep 5s

tests.name: Error handling
tests.run: mv www wwwtf; PORT="$(shuf -i 2000-65535 -n 1)"; node server.js --port=$PORT 2>&1
